pageTitle: Count Master 3D Game - Run and Multiply
pageDescription: Play Count Master 3D Game - The ultimate crowd running game where you multiply your army and defeat enemies!

hero.title: Welcome to Count Master 3D
hero.description: Run, multiply your crowd, and defeat enemies in this exciting 3D game. Gather your army and conquer all obstacles in your path!

howToPlay.title: Command Guide
howToPlay.description: Count Master 3D is an exciting crowd runner game where your goal is to build the biggest army possible and overcome all obstacles. Here's how to get started:

steps.title: Gather Your Crowd
steps.description: Run through number gates to multiply your crowd. The bigger your number, the stronger your army!

steps.title: Avoid Obstacles
steps.description: Navigate through various obstacles that can reduce your crowd size. Stay alert and choose your path wisely!

steps.title: Battle Enemies
steps.description: Engage in battles with enemy crowds. Your success depends on your crowd size and strategic movements.

steps.title: Reach the Finish Line
steps.description: Make it to the end with as many crowd members as possible to achieve victory and earn rewards!

items.title: Multiplication Gates
items.description: Run through gates with multiplication symbols to increase your crowd size exponentially.

items.title: Subtraction Gates
items.description: Avoid gates with subtraction symbols as they will reduce your crowd numbers.

items.title: Crowd Formation
items.description: Your crowd automatically forms different shapes to navigate obstacles efficiently.

items.title: Battle System
items.description: When encountering enemies, your crowds will automatically engage in battle. The larger crowd usually wins!

items.title: Victory Conditions
items.description: Reach the finish line with at least one crowd member to complete the level successfully.

items.title: Power-ups
items.description: Collect special power-ups throughout levels to gain temporary advantages like speed boosts or invincibility.

tips.title: Always Go for Multiplication
tips.description: Prioritize multiplication gates over addition gates for faster crowd growth. A 2x gate is much better than a +10 gate when you already have 50 members!

tips.title: Size Management
tips.description: Sometimes having a smaller, more manageable crowd is better for navigating tight spaces and obstacles.

tips.title: Enemy Assessment
tips.description: Quickly assess enemy crowd sizes before engaging. If they outnumber you, look for ways to increase your numbers first.

tips.title: Strategic Splitting
tips.description: When faced with multiple paths, choose the one that offers the best multiplication opportunities.

tips.title: Obstacle Awareness
tips.description: Stay alert for spinning blades, hammers, and other obstacles that can quickly diminish your crowd size.

battleArena.title: Battle Arena
battleArena.description: Ready to test your skills? Jump into the action and see how far you can go with your crowd! Control your runner, multiply your army, and defeat all enemies in your path.
